div.p: When you deploy content to the FTP host or GIT repository of a Web Site you must authenticate using deployment credentials that you create from the Web Site’s Quick Start or Dashboard management pages.

tr.td: When you connect to the FTP host for a Web Site to deploy content or access diagnostic logs, prepend the username with the name of the Web Site followed by a backslash. For example to authenticate the deployment user “testuser” to connect to the FTP host for the Web Site “testweb” you would specify the username as “testweb\testuser” (without the quotes).

div.p: Follow these steps to set or change deployment credentials for a Web Site:

ol.li: Open the Deployment Credentials dialog box by clicking Set up FTP Credentials on the Quick Start management page or by clicking Reset deployment credentials on the Dashboard management page.
Enter the requested values and click the checkmark.

div.p: Deployment credentials are valid for use with all web sites associated with your subscription.
